findings.title:
Credential in plaintext?

Rule: High Entropy
Line:   '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ';

Commit: .
findings.description:
The application stores sensitive information in cleartext within a resource that might be accessible to another control sphere.

## Additional information

**[High Entropy](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/312.html)**

findings.title: Ensure that HEALTHCHECK instructions have been added to container images.
findings.description:
Ensure that HEALTHCHECK instructions have been added to container images.

## Documentation

- [AWS Terraform](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs)
- [Azure Terraform](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/azurerm/latest/docs)
- [Google Cloud Terraform](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/google/latest/docs)

details.name: Ensure that HEALTHCHECK instructions have been added to container images.
details.snippetText:
1 FROM node:16-buster AS builder
# Install doppler CLI
RUN (curl -Ls --tlsv1.2 --proto "=https" --retry 3 https://cli.doppler.com/install.sh) | sh -s -- --verify-signature
